gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To extricate someone from a difficult situation
pomeni nekoga rešiti iz težavnega položaja.

seg.quote: She found it impossible to extricate herself from the relationship.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To extricate someone from a place
pomeni nekoga spraviti s kraja, v katerem je ujet.

seg.quote: It was exceedingly difficult to extricate her from the hole.
